alert.note: Alert for Chenango; Otsego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 5:11PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Otsego and Chenango Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 511 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pitcher to near Mc Donough to near Smithville Flats. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Norwich, Guilford, Plymouth, North Norwich, Greene, Oxford, Sherburne, Preston, New Berlin and Columbus. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central New York.
